incidents.name: Quality app experiencing issues loading and performing analysis

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue appears to be related to a recent DNS change internally. We have deployed a fix and are monitoring to make sure everything is working as expected.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incident_updates.body: The root cause has been identified and resolved. The Velocity application is now fully available for all users.

incidents.name: [Velocity] Errors when accessing some Analytics reports

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified, and the Engineering team is working on a fix. The next update will be no later than midday EST Jan 18.
We have observed unexpected errors when accessing some Analytics reports within the Velocity application. Our Engineering team is currently investigating.

incidents.name: [Quality] Users reporting 404s when accessing open source repositories

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. All open source users should again be able to view their repositories in Quality without hitting 404s. Additionally, builds for any impacted repositories should work again after a new build is re-triggered.

A fix has been implemented and we're continuing to monitor. As this fix rolls out, some open source repositories may still encounter issues with triggering builds in Quality; however, these users should no longer be hitting 404 errors when trying to view their repositories in Quality's UI.
We've identified a fix and are working to implement it shortly.
We continue to investigate issues with some users not being able to reach open source repositories in Quality. During this time, some users may also experience issues adding open source repositories.
We're continuing to investigate reports of some open source users hitting 404s when trying to access repos in Quality.
We're investigating reports of some users hitting 404s when attempting to access their open source repositories in Quality.
This incident has been resolved.
We've identified the cause of the issue and are in the process of implementing a fix.
We've received reports of users hitting 404s when trying to access open source repositories. We're currently investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
Some users will continue to experience issues with adding private repositories as upstream testing continues. We'll continue to monitor.

We've identified issues with adding public and private repositories due to an upstream provider performing scheduled testing. We've implemented a partial fix and users should again be able to add public repositories. We continue to investigate a fix for adding private repositories.
Some users are reporting issues with cloning private and public repositories. We're investigating the cause.
This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
This incident has been resolved.
We have implemented a remediation and notifications are no longer being delayed. However, we will continue to monitor, as we continue to work on the issue.

We're investigating delays in our notifications system. Due to this, it's possible that some users may experience delays in analysis results during this time. This may include delayed test coverage reports in the app and Github.
